item.title: FaaSChain
item.description: FaaSChain - FaaS Functions as Chain faaschain allows to execute openfaas function as chain chain.Apply(func1).Apply(func2). ApplyModifier(somemodifier). ApplyAsync(func3).Apply(func4). ApplyAsync(func5).Callback(url) Getting Started Get faas-chain template faas-cli template pull https://github.com/s8sg/faaschain Create a new github function faas-cli new --lang faaschain mychain Edit handler.go vim mychain/handler.

item.title: I'm Swarvanu Sengupta
item.description: A software engineer in Seoul, SouthKorea aboutMe := map[string][]string { "languages" : { "go", "java", "C", "C++", "python" }, "interests" : []string{ "Cloud, Distributed System", "Container and Co.", "Recently ML" } } Experience spreading across Application development, Computer Network, Building Cloud Based Solution, high-performance and high-availability distributed environments View my code on GitHub, connect with me on LinkedIn and check out my work below.
